description_en: Paid plans only The Bookmarks Bar shows an overview of all the bookmarks in the project. Bookmarks are a way of marking and quickly moving between events in the Event Sheet View . The Bookmarks Bar In the Event Sheet View, bookmarks can be toggled by pressing F2 or right-clicking and selecting Toggle bookmark . Bookmarks can also be navigated between with Ctrl+F2 (for next bookmark) and Shift+F2 (for previous bookmark). Alternatively you can double-click the bookmark listed in the Bookmarks Bar.
